mapper.update: update game_key set user_num = #{user_num} where key_num = (SELECT key_num FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rn, a.* FROM game_key a where game_id = #{game_id} and user_num is null) WHERE rn = 1)
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_date, u.user_num, od.game_id, g.game_name, game_price, key_num, key_id FROM orders o, order_detail od, games g, game_key gk, smg_users u where od.game_id = g.game_id AND u.user_num = gk.user_num AND o.order_id = od.order_id AND gk.game_id = g.game_id AND u.user_num = #{user_num}
